Banking & Finance.title: US sanctions loom, Russian oil loading for Indian ports halves
Banking & Finance.summary: Russian oil discharged at Indian ports in the first 20 days of November averaged 1.89 million barrels per day (bpd), up from 1.62 million bpd in October, according to provisional data from global commodity data and analytics provider Kpler.
